svg.content: <mxfile><diagram name="運用監視層システム関連図" id="operating-monitoring-system"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 452px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 304px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1f497d;

display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1f497d, #93b7e3); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
